plugins.verifyConditionsCmd: echo 'Checking VSCE_PAT...' && test -n "${VSCE_PAT}" && echo 'Checking OVSX_PAT...' && test -n "${OVSX_PAT}"
plugins.prepareCmd: pnpm version ${nextRelease.version} --no-git-tag-version && pnpm run compile && pnpm run package

plugins.publishCmd: npx vsce publish --no-dependencies -p ${VSCE_PAT} && npx ovsx publish --no-dependencies -p ${OVSX_PAT}
